common.data-will-be-lost: The data will not be saved

offline.cant-update: Data is not updated without internet

login.instruction: Please select your institution, then enter your KRETA credentials.
login.pp-and-tos: Privacy policy and terms of service
login.forgot-password: If you forgot your credentials, contact your institution's KRETA administrator.
login.teacher-role-needed:
Only teachers can log in to this app.

For students and their parents, we recommend the Arisztokreta app. Do you want to open it in the store?
login.no-internet-institute-list: The institute list can't be loaded, because there's no internet connection.

password-confirm.message: To use this function, you'll have to enter your password again.

institute-selector.list-empty: We couldn't download the list of the institutions. KRETA is probably under maintenance.

timetable.title: Timetable
timetable.no-lesson-today: You don't have any lessons on this day
timetable.error-offline: There's no internet, therefore the lesson can't be logged right now.
timetable.error-cancelled: Cancelled lessons can't be administered in the app, use the web interface.
timetable.error-substituted: This lesson is marked for substitution, therefore you can't log it.

logging.title: Log a lesson
logging.required-topic: Please enter the topic of the lesson
logging.required-homework-desc: You must provide a description for the homework
logging.couldnt-save: The server responded with the following error:
logging.cancelled-alert-desc: The evaluations, memos, and homeworks you entered will not be saved if you continue.

curriculum.title: Curriculum
curriculum.list-empty-desc: Looks like you haven't uploaded a curriculum for this group. You can upload one using the web based KRETA.

eval.title: Evaluation
eval.info-days-limit:
Due to technical reasons, the list only contains the groups you had lesson with in the last {{value}} days.
You can grade the rest through the logging menu option.
eval.info-days-imit-empty:
Due to technical reasons, the list only contains the groups you had lesson with in the last {{value}} days.
You can grade the rest through the logging menu option.
eval.error-no-connection: There's no internet, therefore the group cannot be evaluated right now.

notlogged.title: Not logged lessons
notlogged.info-days-limit: Due to technical reasons this list only includes the non-logged lessons of the last {{value}} days.
notlogged.info-days-limit-empty: Due to technical reasons, we can only check the last {{value}} days lessons.
notlogged.error-offline: There's no internet, therefore the lesson can't be logged right now.

not-enabled.header: Messaging is disabled in your institution
not-enabled.message: Please contact your school's KRETA administrator, if you'd like to use it

settings.title: Settings
settings.usage-statistics-desc: This helps us develop the app
settings.error-reporting-desc: Also helps us with the development

exceptions.invalid-response.message: The KRETA server sent an invalid response. It's probably under maintenance.
exceptions.network-exception.message: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection!
exceptions.server-side-error.message: The server indicated, that it has an internal error. This usually occurs when the KRETA is under maintenance.
exceptions.logged-out.title: KRETA logged you out
exceptions.logged-out.message: The server ended your login session. Please log in again.
